title: Senior HR – Remote (Full-Time)
job_overview:
Job Title: Senior HR – Remote (Full-Time)
Company: Nova Underground LLC
Work Hours: Full-Time | 9 AM – 5 PM EST (Monday to Friday)
Compensation: $8–$10/hour (based on experience) | Weekly pay via Wise


???? About Nova Underground
Nova Underground LLC is a U.S.-based underground utility contractor serving major telecom companies across multiple states. As we scale rapidly, we are building a world-class remote support team in the Philippines. We're now hiring a Senior HR t who brings professionalism, structure, and 5+ years of experience in handling human resources for high-growth teams.

???? Role Overview
This is not an entry-level role. You will take ownership of onboarding, compliance, personnel tracking, and supporting a growing field team of employees and subcontractors. You’ll work closely with executive leadership to build scalable HR systems.

? Responsibilities
- Manage complete onboarding for employees and subcontractors (W9s, COIs, agreements, NDAs, DocuSign, etc.)
- Track expiration dates, renewals, and compliance documents
- Maintain up-to-date HR records and organize all employee/subcontractor documents in Google Drive
- Support time tracking, weekly payroll reporting, and contractor billing audits
- Coordinate job postings, applicant vetting, and interviews
- Assist in drafting offer letters, contracts, and performance documents
- Build and maintain HR SOPs and a structured onboarding system
- Coordinate HR workflows across multiple states and vendors

???? Requirements
- 5+ years of HR or People Operations experience (preferably remote and international)
- Advanced knowledge of HR systems, onboarding flows, and compliance best practices
- Excellent written and spoken English
- Strong attention to detail and document management
- Independent, self-motivated, and able to meet deadlines without micromanagement
- Proficient in Google Workspace, DocuSign, Airtable, and project management tools
- Stable internet and a quiet, professional home office setup

? Bonus Skills
- Familiarity with U.S. labor classifications (1099 vs. W2) and multi-state HR nuances
- Experience working with U.S.-based construction or field service companies
- HR policy writing and implementation

???? How to Apply
Send your OnlineJobs.ph profile, link of your updated resume, and a short cover letter detailing your experience managing HR operations for U.S. companies. Include specific examples of HR systems you’ve helped implement or improve. Send it to Upgrade to see actual info 

We’re looking for someone who is experienced, dependable, and looking for long-term growth within a fast-paced, entrepreneurial company.
